MAN.TITLE: pyrup

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Type of the filter used for convolution; only GAUSSIAN_5x5 is currently supported.

DESCRIPTION.P: pyrupThe function pyrup performs up-sampling step of Gaussian pyramid decomposition. First it upsamples the source image by injecting even zero rows and columns and then convolves result with the specified filter multiplied by 4 for interpolation. So the destination image is four times larger than the source image.
